content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Plate Production Facility at Position (-14.5, -48.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0), refueled with coal, extracting iron ore.
- Wooden Chest at position (-14.5, -48.5), storing extracted iron ore.
- Stone Furnace at position (-13.0, -48.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (-14.5, -46.5), transferring iron ore from the chest to the furnace.

### Coal Mining and Processing Facility at Position (41.5, -80.5)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0), refueled with coal, extracting coal.
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -80.5), storing extracted coal.
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0), smelting iron ore into iron plates.
- Burner Inserter at position (43.5, -80.5), transferring items between entities.

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors due to Insufficient Inventory for Insertion
- Ensure that you have the necessary items in your inventory before attempting to insert them into a structure. This will prevent errors related to attempting to insert non-existent items.

### Errors when Chests are Full
- Regularly check and empty chests that are full to ensure continuous operation of mining drills. This will prevent warnings and interruptions in resource extraction.

### Errors when Furnaces Lack Ingredients
- Monitor the ingredient levels in furnaces to prevent them from running out of materials to process. This will avoid warnings and ensure continuous production.
